data.name: SelectGroupList
data.value: SELECT GGPL.GID,GNAME GroupName,CNT Count,cast(FAVCNT as integer) FavoriteCount, DL.DRIVE, FSL.FILESIZE, GGPL.KEYWORD, GGPL.COMPLETE IsCompleted, GGPL.LASTUPDATE FROM (SELECT GPL.GID,GPL.GROUPNAME GNAME , ifnull(ACL.cnt,0) CNT #CLASS1COUNT# FAVCNT, GPL.KEYWORD, GPL.COMPLETE, GPL.LASTUPDATE FROM (#LASTEXECSQL#) PL #JOIN# GROUP BY GPL.GROUPNAME ORDER BY GPL.LASTUPDATE DESC, GPL.GID DESC) GGPL LEFT JOIN (SELECT DSLIST.GID, SUMSTR(DSLIST.DRIVE) DRIVE FROM MOVLIST DSLIST GROUP BY DSLIST.GID) DL ON ifnull(GGPL.GID,'') = ifnull(DL.GID,'') LEFT JOIN (SELECT GID, SUM(FILESIZE) FILESIZE FROM MOVLIST GROUP BY GID) FSL ON ifnull(GGPL.GID,'') = ifnull(FSL.GID,'')

data.name: SelectLibraryList
data.value: SELECT PL.ID AS ID, FILEPATH, GPL.GROUPNAME AS GROUPNAME, TITLE, NO, LENGTH, CODEC, PLAYED AS ISPLAYED, RATING, DATE, VIDEOSIZE, PLAYCOUNT, ADDDATE, LASTPLAYDATE, GPL.GID AS GID, SEASON FROM MOVLIST PL LEFT JOIN MOVGROUPLIST GPL ON PL.GID = GPL.GID
data.comment: ライブラリリスト取得

data.name: SQL002
data.value: SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM MOVLIST WHERE FILEPATH = :FilePath
data.comment: 既にDBに存在するか確認するSQL(filepath)

data.name: InsertLibrary
data.comment: プレイリストにレコードを挿入するSQL

data.name: SelectLastInsertRowid
data.value: SELECT last_insert_rowid() AS LASTROWID

data.name: SQL005
data.value: UPDATE PLAYLIST SET TITLE = :Title , PLAYCOUNT = :PlayCount , RATING = :Rating , DATE = :Date, ADDDATE = :AddDate, NOTFOUND = :NotFound WHERE ID = :Id
data.comment: プレイリストのベース情報更新

data.name: SQL007
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET LASTPLAYDATE = :LastPlayDate WHERE ID = :Id
data.comment: プレイリスト詳細情報更新

data.name: SQL016
data.value: SELECT sum(round((julianday('00:' || length)-julianday('00:00:00')) * 86400)) FROM PLAYLIST PL
data.comment: 再生時間の合計を取得(sec)

data.name: SQL017
data.value: SELECT PLAYCOUNT FROM PLAYLIST WHERE ID = :Id

data.name: InsertPlayingList
data.value: INSERT INTO PLAYINGLIST(ID, SORT) VALUES (@Id, @Sort)

data.name: DeletePlayingList
data.value: DELETE FROM PLAYINGLIST

data.name: SQL020
data.value: SELECT count(*) FROM PLAYINGLIST
data.comment: 再生中リストカウント

data.name: SelectIdFromGid
data.value: SELECT PL.ID FROM MOVLIST PL WHERE GID = @Gid
data.comment: グループIDに一致するIDを取得

data.name: SelectGIdByGroupName
data.value: SELECT GID FROM MOVGROUPLIST WHERE lower(GROUPNAME) = @GroupName
data.comment: 既にDBに存在するか確認するSQL(groupname)

data.name: InsertGroup
data.comment: グループプレイリストにレコードを挿入するSQL

data.name: UpdateGidById
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET GID = @Gid WHERE ID = @Id

data.name: UpdateGroupLastUpdateDatetime
data.value: UPDATE MOVGROUPLIST SET LASTUPDATE = @LastUpdate WHERE GID = @Gid
data.comment: グループ最終更新日時更新

data.name: SelectGroupKeyword
data.value: SELECT GID, GROUPNAME FROM MOVGROUPLIST WHERE KEYWORD = @Keyword

data.name: SQL028
data.value: SELECT ID, TITLE FROM MOVLIST WHERE GID IS NULL

data.name: UpdateUnGroup
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET GID = null WHERE GID = @Gid

data.name: DeleteGroup
data.value: DELETE FROM MOVGROUPLIST WHERE GID = @Gid

data.name: UpdateGroup
data.value: UPDATE MOVGROUPLIST SET GROUPNAME = @GroupName, KEYWORD = @Keyword WHERE GID = @Gid
data.comment: グループ名とキーワード変更

data.name: UpdateLibraryReplaceGroupName
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET TITLE = replace(TITLE, @OldGroupName, @NewGroupName) WHERE GID = @Gid
data.comment: グループ名変更によるタイトル更新

data.name: SQL033
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET FILEPATH = :FilePath, TITLE = :Title, DRIVE = SUBSTR(:FilePath,1,1), FILESIZE = GETFILESIZE(:FilePath) WHERE ID = :Id

data.name: UpdateLibraryFilePath
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET FILEPATH = @FilePath, DRIVE = SUBSTR(@FilePath,1,1), FILESIZE = GETFILESIZE(@FilePath) WHERE ID = @Id

data.name: SQL035
data.value: SELECT KEYWORD FROM MOVGROUPLIST WHERE GID = :Gid

data.name: SQL036
data.value: UPDATE MOVGROUPLIST SET KEYWORD = :Keyword WHERE GID = :Gid

data.name: SQL037
data.value: SELECT max(sort) FROM PLAYINGLIST

data.name: UpdatePlayCount
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET PLAYCOUNT = PLAYCOUNT + 1, LASTPLAYDATE = @LastPlayDate WHERE ID = @Id

data.name: SQL039
data.value: SELECT GID FROM MOVLIST WHERE ID = :Id

data.name: UpdateGroupIsCompleted
data.value: UPDATE MOVGROUPLIST SET COMPLETE = @Complete WHERE GID = @Gid

data.name: UpdateLibraryIsPlayed
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET PLAYED = @Played WHERE ID = @Id

data.name: SQL042
data.value: SELECT MGL.GROUPNAME FROM MOVLIST ML inner join MOVGROUPLIST MGL ON ML.GID= MGL.GID WHERE FILEPATH like :FilePath limit 1

data.name: SelectGroupIdCount
data.value: SELECT count(GID) GCNT FROM MOVLIST WHERE GID = @Gid GROUP BY GID

data.name: SelectFavGroupIdCount
data.value: SELECT count(ID) FROM MOVLIST WHERE GID = @Gid AND RATING = 9
data.comment: GIDのお気に入りの件数取得

data.name: SQL045
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET TITLE = :Title WHERE ID = :Id

data.name: SQL046
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET NO = :No WHERE ID = :Id

data.name: SQL047
data.value: SELECT TITLE, ID, GID FROM MOVLIST WHERE FILEPATH like :FilePath ORDER BY ADDDATE DESC LIMIT 1

data.name: UpdateMediaInfo
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET TITLE = @Title, LENGTH = @Length, CODEC = @Codec, VIDEOSIZE = @VideoSize WHERE ID = @Id

data.name: SQL049
data.value: SELECT ID, FILEPATH FROM MOVLIST WHERE GID = :Gid AND ABS(NO) > (SELECT ABS(NO) FROM MOVLIST WHERE ID = :Id) ORDER BY ABS(NO) ASC LIMIT 1

data.name: SQL050
data.value: SELECT ID, FILEPATH FROM MOVLIST WHERE GID = :Gid AND ABS(NO) < (SELECT ABS(NO) FROM MOVLIST WHERE ID = :Id) ORDER BY ABS(NO) DESC LIMIT 1

data.name: SQL051
data.value: SELECT FILESIZE || ifnull(NO,'') || LENGTH FROM MOVLIST GROUP BY FILESIZE || ifnull(NO,'') || LENGTH

data.name: SQL052
data.value: SELECT ID,FILESIZE, NO, LENGTH FROM MOVLIST WHERE FILESIZE = :Filesize AND ifnull(NO, '') = :No AND LENGTH = :Length ORDER BY ID
data.comment: 同じファイルのものを取得

data.name: SQL053
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET FILEPATH = :FilePath, NOTFOUND = 0 WHERE Id = :Id

data.name: SelectAllFilePath
data.value: SELECT FILEPATH FROM MOVLIST GROUP BY FILEPATH
data.comment: 重複チェック用SQL（ファイルパス）

data.name: SelectShuffleLibrary
data.value: SELECT * FROM (#LastExecSql#) ORDER BY random() limit @LimitNum
data.comment: ライブラリシャッフル用

data.name: SelectMostUseDirectoryPath
data.value: SELECT GETDIRPATH(FILEPATH) FP, COUNT(*) CNT FROM MOVLIST GROUP BY FP ORDER BY CNT DESC
data.comment: 一番使用しているディレクトリを取得。

data.name: SelectIdFromFileName
data.value: SELECT ID FROM MOVLIST WHERE FILEPATH LIKE @FileName
data.comment: ファイル名からIDを取得

data.name: SelectInCompleteIdFilePaths
data.value: SELECT ID, FILEPATH FROM MOVLIST WHERE LENGTH = @Length OR ifnull(TITLE, '') = ''
data.comment: 不完全ID、ファイルパスリスト取得

data.name: UpdateLibraryRating
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET RATING = @Rating WHERE ID = @Id

data.name: DeleteLibrary
data.value: DELETE FROM MOVLIST WHERE ID = @Id

data.name: SelectLibraryPreviousAndNextId
data.value: SELECT (SELECT ID FROM MOVLIST WHERE GID = @Gid AND ABS(NO) < ABS(@No) ORDER BY ABS(NO) DESC Limit 1) Previous, (SELECT ID FROM MOVLIST WHERE GID = @Gid AND ABS(NO) > ABS(@No) ORDER BY ABS(NO) ASC Limit 1) Next

data.name: UpdateLibrary
data.value: UPDATE MOVLIST SET TITLE = @Title, NO = @No, SEASON = @Season WHERE ID = @Id
